statements: UPDATE security_breaches SET affected_records = 500 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc' AND breach_type = 'Online';
UPDATE security_breaches SET company_name = 'XYZ Ltd', breach_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE security_breaches SET company_name = 'Example Inc.', affected_records = 1000, breach_type = 'Data Leak' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE security_breaches SET breach_date = '2022-10-15', affected_records = 500, company_name = 'ABC Corp', breach_type = 'Unauthorized Access' WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Ltd';
UPDATE security_breaches SET breach_description = 'Customer data leak' WHERE breach_id = 1;
UPDATE mitigation_plans SET mitigation_cost = 5000.00, mitigation_strategy = 'Data encryption' WHERE plan_id = 3;
UPDATE security_breaches SET breach_date = '2022-01-15', breached_company = 'Company A' WHERE breach_id = 1;
UPDATE mitigation_plans SET mitigation_cost = 5000.00, mitigation_strategy = 'Enhanced Security Measures' WHERE breach_id = 3 AND plan_id = 2;
UPDATE security_breaches SET breach_description = 'Data leak from internal server' WHERE breach_id = 1;
UPDATE breach_locations SET state = 'California', city = 'San Francisco' WHERE breach_id = 2;
UPDATE security_breaches SET breach_type = 'Internal', data_records_lost = 100000 WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Corp';
UPDATE breach_analysis SET severity_level = 'High', mitigation_strategy = 'Implement advanced security protocols' WHERE breach_id = 123;
UPDATE security_breaches SET company_name = 'ABC Corp' WHERE breach_id = 1;
UPDATE breach_analysis SET analysis_report = 'Updated analysis report' WHERE analysis_id = 2;
UPDATE security_breaches SET company_name = 'XYZ Corp', data_records_lost = 1500 WHERE breach_id = 102;
UPDATE breach_analysis SET analysis_report = 'The breach impact is high and requires immediate action' WHERE analysis_id = 201;
UPDATE security_breaches SET type='Data Leak', description='Sensitive information exposed' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE affected_companies SET industry='Technology', company_name='Tech Co.' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE security_breaches SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE affected_companies SET industry = 'Healthcare' WHERE company_name = 'Acme Corp';
